sub_title: Adviseur Wet Open Overheid en Datasturing
summary:
Als het maar hart heeft!

In ieder geval tot maart 2024 in een grotemensenbaan bij gemeente Zevenaar (Adviseur Wet open overheid en Datasturing). Daarnaast werk ik aan projecten via mijn bedrijf Studio Berthe (www.studioberthe.nl). Zo ben ik sinds 2021 trotse coördinator van de Zevenaarse energiecoaches, en werk ik aan een animatie over de historie van water in de Liemers. Ook ben ik in de avonduurtjes bezig met een nieuwe boekvertaling: The Four Fold Way van Angeles Arrien. Een prachtig boek over mens-zijn en de ontwikkeling van leiderschap vanuit het perspectief van verschillende culturen.

projects.title: HAL12 Interior Design : Beeldkwaliteitsplan
projects.description:
Creating a guideline/vision book for the interior design direction of a 7000 square meter factory  hall, focusing on sustainability and sharing economy. 

About HAL12. The hall has been bought by the local government, and several interested cultural and social parties (theatre, library, social services etc.) were exploring the possibilities to share the space with the municipality, which had already moved in. The ambition was to have maximum sharing of space going on - in the sense that everybody can use almost every room. As an example, the boardroom for the local council will also become a multi purpose shared space. It's a big project in a relatively small municipality that brings together NGOs, politics and businesses to share one inspiring building.

projects.title: Women's Circle Amsterdam
projects.description: Doris and I hosted/facilitated Women's Circles to create a space for women to talk about the situations they encounter in modern day life. We hosted several women's circles around various themes like ancestors, storytelling, age, boundaries.

projects.title: JAMsterdam- Amsterdam Service Jam
projects.description: JAMsterdam is part of the Global Service Jam which happened in 106 cities all over the world during the weekend of March 1st-3rd. We organized, hosted, and facilitated a 48 hr weekend full of fun, play, creativity, and design thinking processes together to create service businesses that change the world.

contributors.headline: Adviseur Wet Open Overheid en Datasturing

projects.title: Writing a Book about and for Social Entrepreneurs
projects.description: As a team we explored the stories of entrepreneurs, diving into the complexity of the day to day life, trying to find out what book would actually help people. We developed several models and did several interviews, to conclude that after half a year we are preferred to primarily focus on our own businesses / education. So: there is no book, but a fun ride we had.

profile_positions.description: Ik maak samen met Michiel Artz (animator) en Ferdinand van Hemmen (landschapshistoricus) voor het Liemers Museum een animatie over De Conventie van 1771. Daar heeft vrijwel niemand van gehoord: maar het is de basis voor het waterbeheer in Nederland! Hier maakten Gelderland, Holland en Pruisen afspraken over waterverdeling en het onderhoud / de aanleg van waterwerken. Dankzij deze conventie hebben we in Nederland (meestal) droge voetjes! Erg belangrijk dus. Aan mij de eer om het script te schrijven. Met de veelvuldige historische input van Ferdinand. De animatie wordt in het voorjaar van 2022 gelanceerd!
profile_positions.title: Scriptschrijver en organisator

profile_positions.description: Gemeente Zevenaar kan dankzij de RREW starten met energiecoaches. Deze coaches geven gratis en onafhankelijk advies aan inwoners van de gemeente Zevenaar over het besparen van energie in hun woningen. Ik heb het team gevormd en verzorg de organisatie van het project en de coördinatie van het team.
profile_positions.title: Coördinator energiecoaches Gemeente Zevenaar

profile_positions.description: NME Liemers is een prachtige organisatie die natuur- en milieueducatie verzorgt in de regio de Liemers. Doordat de gemeenten hier, zoals alle gemeenten in Nederland, fors moeten bezuinigen, wordt de toekomstige dienstverlening van NME Liemers bedreigd. Ik ben ingevlogen om taken van de coördinator over te nemen en samen de toekomstscenario's voor NME Liemers uit te werken.
profile_positions.title: Adviseur Toekomstscenario's NME Liemers

profile_positions.description: In Zevenaar a beautiful social-cultural center is being developed in an old factory building right near the city center. The construction work is almost done and its governance structure is planned to be ready in July 2020. Up until that point I am the coördinator for matters regarding managing the space / facilities management / programming / communication, and developing a foundation for collaboration with the partners.
profile_positions.title: Interim coördinator Turmac Cultuurfabriek

profile_positions.description: Remember the 'Hand' in Game of Thrones? That has been my job in the Turmac Cultuurfabriek project in Zevenaar. Of course, there was not that much bloodshed, or strategic intrigue. Rather, the comparison points to the way I worked with my client. As a team we strategized together about the topics of Participation, Architecture, Interior Design, Catering revenue models, service structures, internal and external communication etc. We try to approach every decision with a creative mind.
profile_positions.title: Executive Assistant

profile_positions.description: Does the world around you look like your wildest dreams? Studio Berthe aims to contribute to moving our society to a more creative, fun, and sustainable version of itself. To do so, we facilitate collaborative and creative processes using Social Technologies (Genuine Contact, NVC, Blueprint of WE) in the cultural, social and environmental sector.
profile_positions.title: Founder

profile_positions.description: Invoeren van de Wet Open Overheid in gemeente Zevenaar incl impactanalyse, projectplan, cultuurverandering en implementatie organisatiebreed. Daarnaast in deeltijd aan zet voor het opstellen en uitvoeren van de Datastrategie < hoe gaan we met gegevens om? welke ambities hebben we? wat is er nodig en mogelijk in de komende jaren op het gebied van data en gegevensbeheer?
profile_positions.title: Adviseur Wet Open Overheid en Datasturing

profile_positions.description: Interim functie waarin ik werk aan de nieuwe dienstverleningsvisie van Gemeente Zevenaar, monitoring van de dienstverlening, coördinatie van het collegiaal bijstandsteam (CBT), en het dienstverleningsaspect van de implementatie van de omgevingswet.
profile_positions.title: Interim Beleidsmedewerker Dienstverlening

profile_positions.description: Guiding the transition to a new beautiful bigger location with all the implications regarding professionalizing the organization. Of course, with care for all the lovely volunteers working at this organization.
profile_positions.title: Board Member

profile_positions.description:
Providers of Goodness is the Design Center for Collective Innovation. We design collective innovation processes to build a sustainable future together. We focus on creating solutions from collective understanding within international networks. With our expertise in process facilitation and the application of social technologies, branding, graphic design, and environment, we work on social and environmental entrepreneurship, organizational transformation, and education design for global leadership.

Providers of Goodness (POG) is an international organization that currently has projects running in Norway and Korea, in the sectors of business and education. POG has created the Collaboration Design Model and is host to the Knowmadic Gene Project. 

Providers of Goodness published the book : “The Knowmadic Gene : universal guide to collaboration capacity development” (Author: Gowoon Lim).
profile_positions.title: Partner

profile_positions.description:
DO LOVE DESIGN (DLD) offers brand communication consulting to supports individuals and organizations to grow, share and shine. We design processes that allow for empathy, appreciation and creativity to exist. We believe value-driven and process-oriented work in business is possible.

As Project Manager and Brand Content Developer at DLD I co-facilitate the process of discovering a brand's direction and applied this to a brand's content (f.i. by writing a presentation book, web content, social media strategy etc.).
profile_positions.title: Co-founder

profile_positions.description: The Knowmadic Gene: universal guide for collaboration capacity development
profile_positions.title: The Knowmadic Gene

profile_positions.description:
I was responsible for the finances and the bookkeeping for Knowmads Cooperative, the creative project development company that Knowmads students run together during their year at Knowmads Business School.

I guided the process of shutting it down, doing all the final paperwork.
profile_positions.title: Co-owner and Financial Administrator

profile_positions.description: I supported my boss in prioritizing her schedule and tasks, I worked on the internal communication and smoothened internal organizational processes.
profile_positions.title: Flow Manager

profile_positions.description:
As a student of Knowmads Business School you are automatically also an entrepreneur. I've done creative concept design assignments for and with Picnic Festival, Solidaridad and NachtLab. 

Next to the projects, the year has brought a lot of personal and professional growth with workshops on Business Design, Non Violent Communication, Deep Democracy, Facilitation, Visual Facilitation, Storytelling and Constellation works.
profile_positions.title: Knowmad / Edu-preneur

profile_positions.description: I was the only staff member of the "Green-Left" (GroenLinks) political party in the province of Utrecht. I worked both as a secretary to the politicians - arranging all sorts of meetings and writing the reports on the meetings -, as a webmaster to their website and as an editor of several kinds of publications including press releases and the provincial political magazine of this party.
profile_positions.title: Assistant
